     <path class="bar-four" d="M100.68,27.39c-0.85,0-1.7-0.31-2.37-0.93C86.52,15.61,71.19,9.63,55.15,9.63c-15.86,0-31.06,5.86-42.79,16.5
      c-1.43,1.3-3.65,1.19-4.94-0.24c-1.3-1.43-1.19-3.65,0.24-4.94C20.68,9.13,37.55,2.63,55.15,2.63c17.81,0,34.82,6.64,47.91,18.69
      c1.42,1.31,1.51,3.52,0.2,4.95C102.57,27.01,101.63,27.39,100.68,27.39z">
     </path>
    </symbol>
    <symbol id="icon-ra-red-flag" viewbox="0 0 20 20">
     <title>
      Red Flag Icon
     </title>
     <path d="M4.419,1.973v9.546c0,0,8.977-4.559,7.884,0.285
      c0,0,5.319-1.663,6.364-1.425V0.976c0,0-4.56,0.523-6.032,1.282C12.636,2.257,13.491-1.684,4.419,1.973z" style="fill:#F2695F;">
     </path>
     <path d="M2.495,0.263c0.643,0,1.164,0.521,1.164,1.164v17.146
      c0,0.643-0.521,1.164-1.164,1.164c-0.643,0-1.164-0.521-1.164-1.164V1.427C1.332,0.784,1.853,0.263,2.495,0.263z" style="fill:#F2695F;">
     </path>
    </symbol>
    <symbol id="icon-ra-organization" viewbox="0 0 45 45">
     <title>
      Analysis and Organization Icon
     </title>
     <path d="M11.7,28.3c1.5,0,2.9,0.6,3.9,1.6l10.1-7.3
        c-0.5-0.9-0.8-2-0.8-3.1c0-0.7,0.1-1.3,0.3-1.9l-10-4.4c-0.8,1-2.1,1.7-3.5,1.7c-2.5,0-4.5-2-4.5-4.5c0-2.5,2-4.5,4.5-4.5
        c2.5,0,4.5,2,4.5,4.5c0,0.4,0,0.7-0.1,1l10,4.4c1.2-1.9,3.3-3.1,5.7-3.1c3.7,0,6.8,3,6.8,6.8c0,3.8-3,6.8-6.8,6.8
        c-1.9,0-3.7-0.8-4.9-2.1l-10.1,7.3c0.4,0.7,0.6,1.6,0.6,2.4c0,3.1-2.5,5.6-5.6,5.6c-3.1,0-5.6-2.5-5.6-5.6S8.6,28.3,11.7,28.3z" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;fill:#439f47;">
     </path>
     <path d="M5.7,33.9c0-3.3,2.7-6,6-6c1.5,0,2.8,0.5,3.9,1.5l9.5-6.9c-0.4-0.9-0.6-1.9-0.6-3
        c0-0.6,0.1-1.1,0.2-1.7l-9.4-4.2c-0.9,1-2.2,1.6-3.6,1.6c-2.7,0-4.9-2.2-4.9-4.9c0-2.7,2.2-4.9,4.9-4.9c2.7,0,4.9,2.2,4.9,4.9
        c0,0.3,0,0.5-0.1,0.8l9.4,4.1c1.4-1.9,3.5-3,5.9-3c4,0,7.2,3.2,7.2,7.2c0,4-3.2,7.2-7.2,7.2c-1.9,0-3.6-0.7-5-2l-9.5,6.9
        c0.3,0.7,0.5,1.5,0.5,2.3c0,3.3-2.7,6-6,6C8.4,39.9,5.7,37.2,5.7,33.9z M27.2,23.8c1.2,1.3,2.9,2,4.6,2c3.5,0,6.4-2.9,6.4-6.4
        c0-3.5-2.9-6.4-6.4-6.4c-2.2,0-4.2,1.1-5.4,2.9l-0.2,0.3l-10.7-4.7l0.1-0.3c0.1-0.3,0.1-0.6,0.1-0.9c0-2.2-1.8-4.1-4.1-4.1

     </path>

     </circle>

  <style>
   .region-select-overlay{
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
  height: 100vh;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 10000;
  text-align: center;
  display: none;
}
.region-select-modal{
  position: relative;
  margin: 0 auto;
  width: 90%;
  max-width: 30rem;
  background: white;
  margin-top: 3rem;
}
.region-select-modal__header{
  background: #f8f8f8;
  padding: .5rem 0;
  display: none;
}
.region-select-modal__header img{
  width: 100%;
  max-width:20rem;
}
.region-select-modal__body{
  background: white;
  padding: 3rem 2rem 2rem 2rem;
}
.region-select-modal .close{
  position: absolute;
  top: 1rem;
  right: 1rem;
  cursor:pointer;
}
.region-select-modal a.tag{
  background: #0c78cf;
  color: white;
  transition: all .2s ease;
}

  background: #004A87;
}

  .region-select-modal__header{
    display: block;
  }
}
  </style>

  <style>
   .content-block--flush{
    padding: 0;
  }
  .content-block.content-block--scene{
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
  }
  .illustration-container{
    position:relative;
    padding: 0;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  .illustration-background{
    width: 80%;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  .illustration-background img{
    width: 100%;
  }
  .illustration-foreground{
    position: relative;
    width: 80%;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  .illustration-foreground img{
    width: 100%;
  }
  .content-block__copy{
    padding: 0 2rem;
    text-align: left;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
  }
  .copy-left .content-block__copy{
    left: 2rem;
  }
  .copy-right .content-block__copy{
    right: 2rem;
  }
  @media screen and (min-width:768px){
    /* .illustration-container{
      height: 30rem;
    } */
    .illustration-background{
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      min-height: 300px;
    }
    .illustration-foreground{
      position: absolute;
      width: 54%;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
    }
    .copy-right .illustration-foreground{
      left: 0;
    }
    .copy-left .illustration-foreground{
      right: 0;
    }
    .illustration-container .content-block__copy{
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
      width: 40%;
    }
  }
  @media screen and (min-width:992px){

  }
  @media screen and (min-width:1200px){

  }

       <h1 class="home_hero_banner_h1">

       <p class="home_hero_banner_p">
       </p>

     <div class="content-block__header">
      <h2 class="benefits_block_font">
       Student success startshere
      </h2>
      <div class="subhead">
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="image-video-stripe left one-half">
      <div class="image-video-stripe__large-image one-half">
       <picture>
        <source media="(min-width: 800px)" srcset="/img/http/aHR0cHM6Ly9tYXJrZXRpbmctdGlpLXN0YXRhbWljLWFzc2V0cy1jYS1jZW50cmFsLTEuczMuY2EtY2VudHJhbC0xLmFtYXpvbmF3cy5jb20vZWRpdG9yaWFsL2ltYWdlcy91cGhvbGQtYWNhZGVtaWMtaW50ZWdyaXR5LnBuZw==?p=large_one_half&amp;s=66e38d1a91a0befba98e923fcf4c0642">

       </picture>
      </div>
      <div class="image-video-stripe__copy text-left benefits_block_font">
       <div>
        <h3>
         Uphold academic integrity
        </h3>
        <p>
         Ensure original work from students and address even the most sophisticated potential misconduct.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>

    </div>
    <div class="content-block bg-white" id="">
     <div class="image-video-stripe right one-half">
      <div class="image-video-stripe__copy text-left benefits_block_font">
       <div>
        <h3>
         Superpower your assessment
        </h3>
        <p>
         Give instructors tools that streamline manual grading processes, so they can spend more time teaching.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="image-video-stripe__large-image one-half">
       <picture>
        <source media="(min-width: 800px)" srcset="/img/http/aHR0cHM6Ly9tYXJrZXRpbmctdGlpLXN0YXRhbWljLWFzc2V0cy1jYS1jZW50cmFsLTEuczMuY2EtY2VudHJhbC0xLmFtYXpvbmF3cy5jb20vZWRpdG9yaWFsL2ltYWdlcy9zdXBlcnBvd2VyLXlvdXItYXNzZXNzbWVudC5wbmc=?p=large_one_half&amp;s=7b93ff896a0756ffa1de52631cc1a195">

          <img srcset="/img/http/aHR0cHM6Ly9tYXJrZXRpbmctdGlpLXN0YXRhbWljLWFzc2V0cy1jYS1jZW50cmFsLTEuczMuY2EtY2VudHJhbC0xLmFtYXpvbmF3cy5jb20vZWRpdG9yaWFsL2ltYWdlcy9zdXBlcnBvd2VyLXlvdXItYXNzZXNzbWVudC5wbmc=?p=large_one_half&amp;s=7b93ff896a0756ffa1de52631cc1a195"/>
         </source>
        </source>
       </picture>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="content-block bg-white" id="">
     <div class="image-video-stripe left one-half">
      <div class="image-video-stripe__large-image one-half">
       <picture>
        <source media="(min-width: 800px)" srcset="/img/http/aHR0cHM6Ly9tYXJrZXRpbmctdGlpLXN0YXRhbWljLWFzc2V0cy1jYS1jZW50cmFsLTEuczMuY2EtY2VudHJhbC0xLmFtYXpvbmF3cy5jb20vZWRpdG9yaWFsL2ltYWdlcy9mb3N0ZXItb3JpZ2luYWwtdGhpbmtpbmcucG5n?p=large_one_half&amp;s=a6ca11c218ba88c5ab5f42bc8621bfcf">

         </source>
        </source>
       </picture>
      </div>
      <div class="image-video-stripe__copy text-left benefits_block_font">
       <div>
        <h3>
         Foster original thinking
        </h3>
        <p>
         Help develop students original thinking skills with high-quality, actionable feedback that fits easily into teachers existing workflows.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="content-block bg-" id="">
     <div class="content-block__header">

    <div class="content-block bg-petrol" id="">
     <div class="multi-column multi-column--5 justify-start" data-match-height="">
      <div class="multi-column__column text-left">
       <h3 class="multi_column_products_font text-white">
        Originality
       </h3>
       <div class="multi-column__copy multi_column_products_copy">
        <p class="text-white">
         Address the originality of student work and emerging trends in misconduct with this comprehensive solution.
        </p>
        <a class="cta-new primary" href="https://www.turnitin.com/products/originality">
         Learn More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="multi-column__column text-left">
       <h3 class="multi_column_products_font text-white">
        Gradescope
       </h3>
       <div class="multi-column__copy multi_column_products_copy">
        <p class="text-white">
         Deliver and grade all types of assessments from anywhere using this modern assessment platform.
        </p>
        <a class="cta-new primary" href="https://www.gradescope.com/">
         Learn More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="multi-column__column text-left">
       <h3 class="multi_column_products_font text-white">
        Similarity
       </h3>
       <div class="multi-column__copy multi_column_products_copy">
        <p class="text-white">
         This robust, comprehensive plagiarism checker fits seamlessly into existing workflows.
        </p>
        <a class="cta-new primary" href="https://www.turnitin.com/products/similarity">
         Learn More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="multi-column__column text-left">
       <h3 class="multi_column_products_font text-white">
        iThenticate
       </h3>
       <div class="multi-column__copy multi_column_products_copy">
        <p class="text-white">
         This high-stakes plagiarism checking tool is the gold standard for academic researchers and publishers.
        </p>
        <a class="cta-new primary" href="https://www.turnitin.com/products/ithenticate">
         Learn More
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="multi-column__column text-left">
       <h3 class="multi_column_products_font text-white">
        FeedbackStudio
       </h3>
       <div class="multi-column__copy multi_column_products_copy">
        <p class="text-white">
         Give feedback and grade assignments with this tool that fosters writing excellence and academic integrity.
        </p>
        <a class="cta-new primary" href="https://www.turnitin.com/products/feedback-studio">

    <div class="content-block bg-" id="">
     <div class="content-block__header">
      <h2>
       Resources
      </h2>
      <div class="subhead">
       <p>
        Turnitin partners with global educators to share smart, creative instructional practices. Explore our blog, teaching tools, guides, white papers, and more.
       </p>
      </div>
      <a class="cta primary" href="/resources">
       See More
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="multi-column multi-column--resources multi-column--3" style="">
      <div class="multi-column__column">
       <a class="text-default" href="https://www.turnitin.com/resources/plagiarism-spectrum-2-0" target="blank">
        <div class="card card--resource card--external_resource" data-rollover="See the infographic">
         <div class="card__header card__header--image">
          <picture class="banner__background">

        <a href="/blog">
         Blog
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a href="/about/accessibility">
         Accessibility
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>

         Privacy
        </a>
       </li>

         CA Privacy Rights
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>

            });
